General_Description: '''More Drachmae More Problems''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Need a [[mercenary]] to help raid the shrines of the [[Followers of Ares]]. [[Drachma|Coins]] and gems left at the shines (sic) to be discussed in person.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]].

*'''Note:'''
''Need a [[mercenary]] to help raid the shrines of the [[Followers of Ares]]. [[Drachma|Coins]] and gems left at the shines (sic) to be discussed in person.''
